local_intent: Compute a top grasp for the white plate, approach and align, execute pick, and verify grasp stability.
assumptions: White plate has been detected and is within reachable workspace.
Perception data available to compute grasp pose.
coherence_with_global: Implements the ComputeGraspPose micro-goal from the global plan and continues with approach, pick, and stability verification consistent with the overall pick-and-place sequence.
